name: Seeker of Truth, Giorno
ability: 【ACT】 [(1)] Choose 1 cost 0 or lower character on your opponent's center stage, and return it to his or her hand.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Golden Wind》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: Can you avoid destruction, Boss?

name: Path Within the Darkness, Mista
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your stock.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Giorno! I see the path I need to take through the darkness!

name: The Path Ahead, Giorno
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: Resolve doesn't mean sacrifice!

name: Final Form, G.W.R
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【ACT】 ability of "The One Chosen by Fate, Giorno", you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock.
【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card frontal attacks, if "This World's "Truth"" is in your climax area, this card gets the following ability until end of turn.
"【AUTO】 [(3)] At the beginning of your encore step, you may pay the cost. If you do, perform the following action 2 times. "Deal 1 damage to your opponent."" (Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: You will never arrive at the "truth" that is going to happen!

name: Embodiment of Justice, Giorno
ability: 【AUTO】 When damage dealt by this card is not canceled, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.
【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your other 《Golden Wind》 characters, 【REST】 it, and move it to an open position of your back stage.
flavor_text: I can't say I feel blessed at all, even though I'm looking at you. Because I've been winning against you from the start.

name: Simmering Fury, Fugo
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Rampant Death" is in your climax area, and you have another 《Golden Wind》 character, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 level X or lower 《Golden Wind》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the total level of the cards put into your waiting room by this effect. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavor_text: It's not something that's spoken. He has true loyalty within him!

name: The One Chosen by Fate, Giorno
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Golden Wind》 characters in front of this card get +500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [(2)]".
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 "Final Form, G.W.R" in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker.

【ACT】 [(2) Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] If you are level 3 or higher, choose 1 "Final Form, G.W.R" marker underneath this card, and put it on any position of your stage. At the end of the turn, you may put that character face up underneath this card as a marker.

name: Heavy Gunshots, Mista
ability: 【CONT】 If "Path Within the Darkness, Mista" is in your clock, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.
【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Golden Wind》 characters.

【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: Therefore, we can shoot them into you!

name: Angry Lunatic Tendencies, Fugo
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, search your deck for up to 1 "Savage Smoke, P.S", put it face up underneath this card as a marker, and shuffle your deck.

【ACT】 [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] If you are level 1 or higher, choose 1 "Savage Smoke, P.S" marker underneath this card, and put it on any position of your stage. At the end of the turn, you may put that character face up underneath this card as a marker.
【ACT】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock & 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 level 1 or lower character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: After that, Fugo underwent Polpo's test and gained Purple Smoke.

name: Closing in on Death, Mista
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Golden Wind》 characters get +500 power.
【ACT】 [Reveal 1 "6 Together as 1, S.B" in your hand & Put it face up underneath this card as a marker] Draw 1 card, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] If you are level 1 or higher, choose up to 5 "6 Together as 1, S.B" markers underneath this card, and put them on separate positions of your stage.
flavor_text: Bucciarati: "Mista, you're going to take that ice and defeat the enemy…"

name: Harbinger of Hope, Polnareff
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to that character's soul ×1000.
【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 "Room in the Turtle" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: Where did the one you brought here go?!

name: Bizarre Investigation Request, Koichi & Reverb Act 3
ability: 【CONT】 The character facing this card cannot move to another position of the stage.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1 level and +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Abundance of Life, G.W
ability: 【CONT】 All of your opponent's characters get the following ability. "【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +2500 power until end of turn."
flavor_text: Useless!

ability: 【CONT】 You can put up to 6 cards with the same card name as this card into your deck.
【CONT】 This card gets +1 soul for each of your other "6 Together as 1, S.B".

name: 6 Together as 1, S.B
ability: 【CONT】 You can put up to 6 cards with the same card name as this card into your deck.
【CONT】 This card gets +1 soul for each of your other "6 Together as 1, S.B".

name: 6 Together as 1, S.B
ability: 【CONT】 You can put up to 6 cards with the same card name as this card into your deck.
【CONT】 This card gets +1 soul for each of your other "6 Together as 1, S.B".

name: 6 Together as 1, S.B
ability: 【CONT】 You can put up to 6 cards with the same card name as this card into your deck.
【CONT】 This card gets +1 soul for each of your other "6 Together as 1, S.B".
flavor_text: Waaaaah! We have to aim lower or else the ice won't get blown out of the glass!

name: 6 Together as 1, S.B
ability: 【CONT】 You can put up to 6 cards with the same card name as this card into your deck.
【CONT】 This card gets +1 soul for each of your other "6 Together as 1, S.B".

name: 6 Together as 1, S.B
ability: 【CONT】 You can put up to 6 cards with the same card name as this card into your deck.
【CONT】 This card gets +1 soul for each of your other "6 Together as 1, S.B".
flavor_text: Over here! Blast right into it!

ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【ACT】 effect of "Angry Lunatic Tendencies, Fugo", this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Golden Wind》 characters you have ×500.

name: Smoke of Death, Fugo
ability: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Golden Wind》, this card gets +1000 power.

【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] During your turn, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 2 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Silent Dance, C.R
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 2 of your opponent's characters, exchange them as 【STAND】, and those characters get +6000 power until end of turn.

name: A New Power, G.W

name: Determination of Life, Giorno
ability: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", put the top 3 cards of your deck into your waiting room.

【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)

name: A New Power, Giorno
ability: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +7500 power.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 "A New Power, G.W" in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker.

name: Unexpected Clean Freak, P.S
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +2500 power for each character in your opponent's back stage.

name: Determined Stand, S.B
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.

name: Ladybug Brooch
ability: 【COUNTER】 Search your deck for up to 1 《Golden Wind》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. name: The "Arrow" of Hope
ability: Choose 1 of your characters, and put it into your stock. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card has 1 or more of the same trait as the character put into your stock by this effect, put that card on any position of your stage. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)

ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)

name: "The Path" to Resolution
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【SHOT】: During this turn, when the next damage dealt by the attacking character that triggered this card is canceled, deal 1 damage to your opponent)

name: Rampant Death
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)

ability: 【AUTO】 When your characters' trigger check reveals a climax, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose 1 level X or lower 《Golden Wind》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the total level of the cards put into your waiting room by this effect. (Climax are regarded as level 0)

ability: 【CONT】 Memory This card gets +2000 power for each "Grand Teachings, Prosciutto" in your memory.
【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if you have 2 or less cards in your memory, you may put this card into your memory.

name: Grand Teachings, Pesci & F.M
ability: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack.
【CONT】 Memory This card gets +1500 power for each "Grand Teachings, Prosciutto" in your memory.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Grand Death" is in your climax area, put up to 1 card from the top of your deck into your stock, choose up to 1 "Significance of Resolution, Prosciutto & T.D" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Golden Wind》 characters.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Flipped World, Illuso & M.M
ability: 【AUTO】 [(5) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] At the beginning of the counter step during your opponent's turn, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 level 1 or higher battle opponent facing this card, and put it at the bottom of your opponent's deck.

ability: 【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects.

name: Man in the Mirror, Illuso
ability: 【CONT】 All of your opponent's characters get "【AUTO】 Encore [(2)]".

name: Conception of the Two, Bh
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Golden Wind》 characters get +500 power.
【ACT】 [(3) Put 1 character from your stage into your waiting room & 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 event card or climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

ability: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Controller of Magnetism" is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -1000 power until end of turn.
【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 《Golden Wind》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.

ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 character from your stage into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, put it into your opponent's waiting room, your opponent chooses up to 1 level 0 or lower character in his or her waiting room, and puts it on the stage position that character was on.

【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)

name: Significance of Resolution, Prosciutto & T.D
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, all characters on your opponent's characters get -X power until end of turn. X is equal to that character's level ×1000.

If you do, deal 4 damage to your opponent, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -3000 power until end of turn. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Mammoni, Pesci & F.M
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a level 0 or lower character among those cards, this card's soul does not decrease by side attacking until end of turn.

flavor_text: Hey, come on now, Number 3! Stop making Number 5 cry!

name: Sudden Fury, Fugo
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your 《Golden Wind》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: You stupid delinquent! Are you messing with me?

name: Z.M
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put this card into your memory. If you do, at the beginning of your next draw phase, choose 1 "Z.M" in your memory, and put it on any position of your stage.
flavor_text: Bucciarati: "Zipper Man!"

name: Pure and Innocent, Narancia
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other 《Golden Wind》 characters, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Where'd you hide that kind of fortune, Bucciarati?

name: Unseen Attack, Bucciarati
ability: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavor_text: Well? This is a pretty creepy ability, isn't it?

name: Sudden Attack, Bucciarati
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another "Z.M", this card gets +4000 power.

【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Z.M", and put it on any position of your stage. Shuffle your deck afterwards, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Zipper Man!

name: Permitted to Join
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavor_text: Come with me, Giorno Giovanna.
